name: Po-Te-Tows
description:
This game was made for the GJL - Game Parade Summer 2021  Game Jam With the theme "One time use".  

Play as the spaceship captain stranded on his ship and running out of oxygen.  The goal is to navigate through the ship and find a way to escape by only using items with "one time use".  So using an item early on means you can't use it in the future.

There are multiple endings depending on what combination of items you have and used (Including a very secret one, so don't tell anyone...), see if you can find them all!

Don't forget to hunt down all the items!  You can see your progress from the main menu.

*Downloadable version recommended, web build sensitivity seems to be way too fast than intended

Controls

WASD, Left Stick- Movement

Mouse, Right Stick - Look

Space, South Button - Jump

Shift, Left Trigger - Sprint

Left Mouse Click, East Button - Pick Up/ Interact

Z/ X, West Button - Swap Items

Q, North Button - Item and Object Pulse X-Ray Vision Finder Thingy that we haven't got a name yet

Alt + F4 - Quit the game, we didn't have time for a pause menu.  If you want to go back to the menu, you will need to trigger a game over

*Controller support enabled
